--- title: 12 publications using GAP in the category "Differential geometry" layout: default_with_title nav_exclude: true ---

[B18] Bulois, M., On the normality of the null-fiber of the moment map for $\theta$- and tori representations, J. Algebra, 507 (2018), 502–524.

[DLZ08] Dubrovin, B., Liu, S., and Zhang, Y., Frobenius manifolds and central invariants for the Drinfeld-Sokolov biHamiltonian structures, Adv. Math., 219 (3) (2008), 780–837.

[E11] Effenberger, F., Stacked polytopes and tight triangulations of manifolds, J. Combin. Theory Ser. A, 118 (6) (2011), 1843–1862.

[GM09] Gracia-Saz, A. and Mackenzie, K. C. H., Duality functors for triple vector bundles, Lett. Math. Phys., 90 (1-3) (2009), 175–200.

[H03] He, Y., $G_2$ quivers, J. High Energy Phys. (2) (2003), 023, 14.

[HS08] Hiss, G. and Szczepański, A., Spin structures on flat manifolds with cyclic holonomy, Comm. Algebra, 36 (1) (2008), 11–22.

[HR15] Hoge, T. and Röhrle, G., On inductively free reflection arrangements, J. Reine Angew. Math., 701 (2015), 205–220.

[LPS18] Lutowski, R., Petrosyan, N., and Szczepański, A., Classification of spin structures on four-dimensional almost-flat manifolds, Mathematika, 64 (1) (2018), 253–266.

[LP15] Lutowski, R. and Putrycz, B., Spin structures on flat manifolds, J. Algebra, 436 (2015), 277–291.

[P07] Putrycz, B., Commutator subgroups of Hantzsche-Wendt groups, J. Group Theory, 10 (3) (2007), 401–409.

[PS10] Putrycz, B. and Szczepański, A., Existence of spin structures on flat four-manifolds, Adv. Geom., 10 (2) (2010), 323–332.

[S18] Szczepański, A., Intersection forms of almost-flat 4-manifolds, Arch. Math. (Basel), 110 (5) (2018), 455–458.
